connection.unverified: Server reachable but MCP protocol could not be verified

sse.parseError: SSE response could not be parsed as MCP JSON-RPC
sse.noDataLines: SSE response did not contain expected data lines
sse.parseWarning: SSE response received but could not parse JSON - verify server configuration
sse.noDataWarning: SSE response received without data lines - verify server configuration

response.nonJsonFormat: Server responded with non-JSON format - may not be MCP compliant
